Data.MessageTemplate:
"Payment of processing fee towards Grid Connectivity application no.{#VAR#} is received.

Regards, C.E. STU, MSETCL"

"Your application no.{#VAR#} is forwarded to Chief Engineer, {#VAR#} for Revised Technical Feasibility Report. Please visit field office for joint survey.

Regards, C.E. STU, MSETCL"

"Load Flow studies are completed for your application no.{#VAR#}. Sent for developer consent. 

Regards, C.E. STU, MSETCL"

"Since you have not accepted/responded to consent called, your application no.{#VAR#} for Grid Connectivity is cancelled.

Regards, C.E. STU, MSETCL"

"Load Flow studies are completed for your application no.{#VAR#}. The proposal for Grid Connectivity is under approval.

Regards, C.E. STU, MSETCL"

"Your application no.{#VAR#} is approved by Competent Authority. Demand note for payment of commitment fee is sent to you. Please make payment within 30 days. Your vendor registration no. for payment of commitment fee is {#VAR#}.

Regards, C.E. STU, MSETCL"

"Due to non-receipt of payment for Commitment fee, your application no.{#VAR#} for Grid Connectivity is cancelled. 

Regards, C.E. STU, MSETCL"

"Thanks for payment of Commitment Fee towards application no.{#VAR#}. Letter for Grid Connectivity for application no.{#VAR#} is issued & sent on your registered email.

Regards, C.E. STU, MSETCL"
